2018 Group Openings

PhD studentship

Atomic engineering of bulk and surface polarisation for enhanced solar energy conversion under the supervision of Prof. Aron Walsh (Materials) and Prof. James Durrant (Chemistry). Details and application instructions here.

Postdoctoral researcher

Modelling thin-film solar cells will involve atomistic simulations as part of the STARCELL project. Details and application instructions here.
